transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello, good afternoon, ma'am.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Ma'am, Shahzad is speaking from IndiaMART's account manager, ma'am.
Customer: Haan haan, sir boliye.
Executive: Ma'am, wo iski categories ke regarding discussion karne ke liye maine call kiya tha aapko. Jaise ki sir, hamare paas do, ma'am, aawaz ja rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan haan, aa rahi hai sir, bataiye.
Executive: To ma'am, ye present time mein hamare paas do type ki categories hain. Jinka matlab yahan pe hamare isme product add nahi hai. Ek TDS meter ho gaya aur dusra ho gaya wood moisture meter.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To in dono pe hum deal karte hain kya ma'am? Kyunki inki hum buyleads jo hai na, wo consume kar rahe the.
Customer: Haan sir, TDS meter aur ye sab dete hain hum.
Executive: Haan. To ma'am, ye dono cheez ye wood moisture meter ye ye cheez?
Customer: Wood moisture wood moisture meter?
Executive: Yes, ma'am.
Customer: Haan, wo bhi dete hain aur TDS meter bhi dete hain.
Executive: To ma'am, ye hamare isme product add nahi hai isme.
Might be ho sakta hai ki agar ho aapke isme add lekin dusre kuch naam se ho. TDS meter to sir dala hua hai usme, TDS meter to hai.
Executive: Ma'am, ye category jo hai na, wo mention nahi hai usme agar TDS meter hamare isme product add hoga na, to jo category hai wo mention nahi hai. Kyunki buyleads jo hamare paas aati hai wo category ki wajah se buyleads aati hai. Na ki product ki wajah se. Haan, jaise wood moisture meter.
Customer: To mujhe kya karna hoga aap bataiye, matlab main add kar du usme ya phir kya? Catalog update karna.
Executive: Ma'am, isko yahan pe update karna padega aur kuch products ke the na, usme matlab kuch missing part tha. Jaise kisi mein specification missing hai, kisi mein price missing hai, kisi mein sirf naam add hai. To ma'am, wo bhi wo bhi cheezein add karni thi. Aur ma'am, ye jo aapke paas jo call aapne kiya tha buyleads pe, uska solution kuch mila ma'am aapko?
Customer: Kiya tha sir maine call wo log app pooch lete hain phir jo hai uske baad main quotation hi bhej deti hu. Ab wo unke upar hai lena na lena. Wo lete abhi tak to ek bhi hamari hit nahi hui hai matlab. Ek bhi hum lead crack nahi kar paaye hain abhi tak. Time aisa nahi hai late di hai. Chalo late wale ka to main samajh sakti hu late gayi hai shayad isliye. Lekin time pe bhi di hai to kai log to mana hi kar dete hain ki hum search kar rahe the aise hi ye wo. Aur kai log phir matlab wo log keh dete hain ki nahi humne le liya. Bahut saare reasons hote hain matlab.
Executive: Haan, ma'am, dekhiye buyer alag alag hote hain, alag alag reason hote hain. Bas ye hota hai ki agar kabhi koi humare zyada tar client baat karte honge, rate wagera lete honge. To main solution.
Customer: Haan, rate.
Executive: Ek to ma'am, main jo wo convert hone wale client hote hain na, wahi hote hain jo rate mangte hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek client ko ma'am minimum hum pata hai teen baar connect karte hain. Ek baar to jab hum buyleads pe jaise buylead aayi hamare paas, usse connect kiya aur uske baad phir jab dobara hum connect karte hain, do se teen din baad ka TDRO lagakar, reminder lagakar, ma'am, do baar connect karte hain na, tab uske baad phir jo client hota hai na, wo convert hota ho pata hai. Ek baar ka ek baar baat karne se ma'am koi bhi client pata hai itna zyada convert conversion hone ke uske chances nahi hote. Nahi wo dobara main baat karti hu main matlab wo baat aisi ho jati hai ki dobara call karne mein koi matlab hi nahi banta. Wo bol dete hain nahi lenge le liya humne. Wo matlab reasons nahi dete na. Matlab thoda sa ye hota hai ki aapke price zyada hai ya kuch aur varieties hain aapke paas ya kya kya make ke aur hain. Kuch further conversation aisi hoti nahi hai ki jisko main matlab extend karke baat karu. Wo wo matlab first step pe hi na ek tarike se wo ho jata hai ki nahi nahi humne le liya ya abhi hamari requirement nahi hai. Bahut saare to phone uthate hi bol dete hain hamari requirement nahi hai.
Executive: To ma'am, aisi buyleads ke liye na main aapko guide kar dunga, koi dikkat nahi hai. Jo matlab ye bolte hain na ki galti se post ho gayi ya to abhi hamari requirement nahi hai. To un buyleads ko to main guide kar sakta hu ki 100% to ma'am nahi hai ki main jo guide karunga wo 100% hi work ho jaye. Lekin agar 90% tak bhi work ho rahi hai to ma'am wo ek positive response hai. Kyunki IndiaMART ek platform hai, online platform hai, open platform. Yahan pe koi bhi aake apni requirement dal sakta hai. Hum bas ye aapko ye guide kar sakte hain matlab jo hamara aaj tak ka experience raha hai na ki kaise lead jo hoti hai wo convert ho sakti hai. Wo cheezein hum aapko guide kar sakte hain. Agar aapke paas char se paanch minute ho, ma'am, bata dijiye main aapko ek link share karta hu. Usme mostly buyleads ka kar deta hu aur ye jo product hai inko bhi main sirf add kar dunga. Main apni aapko screen dikhaunga. Wahan pe aap bas mujhko wo batate rahiye ga main us cheez ko add karta rahunga aur last mein aapko buyleads ka bata dunga. Aur ye ma'am, abhi aapki jo ek ticket thi na, concern tha wo jo buyleads ke regarding se wo wala.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Wo abhi ma'am usme work ho raha hai. Haan, jo backend team hai na wo usse kaam kar rahi hai. Abhi mere paas wo ticket open bhi hai.
Customer: Usse baat kari usse uski requirement ki usse baat nahi kari aapke yahan se kisi ne?
Executive: Nahi, usse main usse baat kar hi raha hai kyunki yahan pe mention hai pura puri cheezein. Abhi kyunki yahan pe agar problem solution ho jata hai na, to ye ticket jo hoti hai apne aap close ho jati hai. Lekin abhi wo ticket jo hai na wo close nahi hui.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo uske uska kehna kya tha matlab kya keh raha tha wo? Ki matlab usse ki jo uska naam rakha tha laboratory class hai wo bol kuch aur raha tha to usme uska kya opinion tha?
Executive: Ma'am, haan usse team ke bhi baat nahi hui, bahut jahil tarike se bol raha tha, koi jahil ganwar client tha wo.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ma'am, uske baat karne se pata chal raha tha ki uneducated person hai wo. Ye recording aapne dala tha na.
Customer: Haan, uski recording bhi bheji thi kisi ko koi parul naam tha kisi ka.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Unko bheji thi maine uski recording.
Executive: Haan, wo cheezein suni thi maine bhi. Mere paas aapka account assign hai to saari ki jo bhi cheezein aap deti hain kisi bhi IndiaMART mein kisi ko bhi aap dengi to mere paas reflect karega aage. Maine wo cheez dekhi thi tabhi to main bol raha hu kuch bahut jahil type ka client tha wo. Matlab ek uneducated nahi hota na jo waisa client tha wo. Ab usse team connect hi kar rahi hai. Agar jis din connect hogi baat karegi usse jo problem uska matlab jo exact jo usne bola hai ya to kaise kya cheezein. Cheezein jo puri conclusion hoga na, wo yahan pe update hoga. Jab update hoga to main aapko call karke bataunga ki ye cheezein thi. Shayad aapke paas bhi call aaye uske regarding to.
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Haan. To ye present time pe ma'am isko main aapko bhej deta hu. Ek link join kar lena main apni screen share kar raha hu. Theek hai ma'am? Achha abhi kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Abhi kar rahe hain abhi.
Customer: Haan, abhi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Mail pe aayega na ye to iska link?
Executive: Ma'am, mail pe aata hai agar aapko WhatsApp pe chahiye to WhatsApp pe bhi send kar dunga.
Customer: Mail pe bhi bhej do, mail pe bhi bhej do. Company mein dekh lo, dekh lo.
Executive: Haan, haan, us pe dekhiye aaya hoga phir company ke mail pe.
Customer: NS trading company 2013@gmail.com pe hai.
Customer: Yes.
Customer: Okay aa gayi.
Executive: Ma'am, usko join kariye aap. Main aapko dikhata hu jo saari cheezein.
Customer: Call connect kar sakte hain sir wo?
Executive: Haan, call connect kar sakte hain. Haan, video call pe baat kar lete hain.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to update product categories.

- No leads are being converted.

- Some clients deny requirement after sometime.

- Some products have missing specifications/prices.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide on buyleads.

- Executive will share a link to update categories.

- Executive will show screen to add products.

- Executive informed about backend team working on ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call after update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Negative | Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product categories, update, clients, connect
